sprint_goal: Establish the secure, auditable backend foundation for the transformation engine. Deliver the Jint sandbox, core auditing service, and foundational script entities.
epic_coverage: Core Transformation Engine & Sandbox, Security, Compliance, and Observability, Transformation Script Management UI
key_deliverables: Secure Jint sandbox service with configurable constraints; Core audit logging service and data model; Basic script and version entities with API for creation.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate sandbox constraint violations (timeout, memory, CLR access) are caught; Show that creating a script via API generates correct audit log entries.
success_criteria: All malicious unit tests for the sandbox are passing; All API endpoints are secured by RBAC; All CUD actions are audited.
risk_factors: RISK-001: Improper sandbox configuration; RISK-005: Data inconsistency in versioning; RISK-007: Audit trail compliance failure.
mitigation_strategies: Dedicated security reviews for sandbox code; Transactional logic for all DB operations; Compliance review of audit log design.
burndown_target: Complete 50% of estimated hours by day 5.

sprint_name: Sprint 2: Interactive Editor Experience & Core Security
sprint_goal: Develop the core interactive editor experience, including real-time validation and preview with timeout, and implement script encryption at rest.
epic_coverage: Transformation Script Management UI, Security, Compliance, and Observability
key_deliverables: Functional script editor with Monaco integration; Real-time syntax validation; Script preview with sample data and a 15s timeout; Encryption at rest for all scripts.
demo_objectives: Show real-time error squiggles in the editor; Demonstrate the preview feature with a simple script; Show a script timeout with an infinite loop; Show that script content in the database is not plaintext.
success_criteria: Monaco editor PoC successful and integrated; Preview API is functional and handles errors/timeouts; Encryption integration test is passing.
risk_factors: RISK-004: Monaco Editor integration complexity; RISK-002: Performance bottlenecks in preview API.
mitigation_strategies: Time-boxed spike for Monaco Editor; Server-side timeout enforcement on preview API.
integration_windows: Frontend/Backend integration for Preview API on day 5-7.
burndown_target: Complete 50% of estimated hours by day 5.

sprint_goal: Implement full script lifecycle management UI (edit, version history, diff) and add operational monitoring via Prometheus metrics.
epic_coverage: Transformation Script Management UI, Security, Compliance, and Observability
key_deliverables: UI for editing existing scripts; Version history viewer with diff and revert capabilities; Prometheus /metrics endpoint with custom transformation metrics.
demo_objectives: Edit a script and show a new version is created; Compare two versions using the diff viewer; Revert a script to a previous version; Show the /metrics endpoint and demonstrate metric changes after script execution.
success_criteria: E2E tests for editing, diffing, and reverting are passing; Prometheus metrics are correctly incremented on success and failure events.
risk_factors: Complexity of diff viewer integration; Performance of version history for scripts with many versions.
mitigation_strategies: Leverage a well-supported diffing library; Paginate version history API if performance issues arise.
integration_windows: Integration testing for versioning APIs on day 4-6.
burndown_target: Complete 50% of estimated hours by day 5.
